spak
クラス ForwardChaining

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--spak.ForwardChaining
直系の既知のサブクラス:
NetworkMonitor
public class ForwardChaining
extends java.lang.Object

Title: ForwardChaining

Description: Scan frames hierarchy and see if we can instantiate an instance (forward-chaining). Process the induce() request.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2002

Company: NII

reInduce

public int reInduce()
Check each instance, regenerate its hash and call reInduceFrame() for each frame

戻り値:
number of reinduced instances

reInduceFrame

public int reInduceFrame(KFrame fr)
1. Check if the instance frame fr should still be a child of its parent frame(s), if not then remove the parent that the condition doesn't match anymore. If no more parent then move it to be a child of Root 2. Check if it should be a child of other frames and update it as needed

パラメータ:
fr - the frame to be reInduced
戻り値:
-1 for error, 0 for no change, 1 if reinduce has activity

removeFromConditionFailedHash

public int removeFromConditionFailedHash(java.lang.String framename)
Remove frames which depend on from the conditionFailedHash return the number of entries remove

パラメータ:
framename -
